about_the_game:
Jump and dash your way, between walls and obstacles.
Avoid to touch what will kill you, and reach the teleport portal.
Get precise and strategic, or die.

INTUITIVE GAMEPLAY : Catch the right orb.

Touch the red orb and become red, and you will touch red walls safely.

Same thing for the blue.
Touch the green orb to ‘extra jump’, you will jump to the next step.
Touch the yellow orb to dash, and fly down, on the side or up to the sky.
Get precise and strategic, or die.

SOLO MODE : Each dimension is getting harder and harder.

5 dimensions. 16 levels per dimension.

Atomic, Molecular, Planetary, Galactic, SuperNova. (More dimensions to come)
A singleplayer challenging adventure.
Get precise and strategic, or die.

CREATIVE MODE : Create your own map.

With the intuitive level editor, create and upload YOUR own level.

Other players will play, like, comment, and will follow you amongst their favorite Astrogon creators.
So, be creative and make insane levels.

INFINITE REPLAYABILITY : a life is not enough to play all levels.

Ranking of top levels, featured creators, and popular levels.

More than 20.000 levels created, already available from creators all over the world.
Make your name become a legend.

MULTIPLAYER MODE : play VS other players.

Beat other players in real time.

Challenge your friend, or play against another player from all over the world.
Perfect for intense live streaming sessions.
Get ranked and be the best.

SPEEDRUN MODE : time is of essence.

Complete 16 levels in a row within the shortest time.

International ranking and world record at stake.
Be fast and precise, or die.

First competitive HARDCORE PRECISION PLATFORMER.

International leaderboard, with ranking per mode.

Solo mode, Creative mode, Multiplayer, Speedrun.
Be popular and followed massively if you rank high.

SKIN IN THE GAME !

Win a maximum of stars to acquire your favorite skins.

Ultraspinner, Transformer, Alieneye and many others.
Skin will not give you the skills, but will give you the style.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

name: Astrogon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

short_description: Hardcore precision platformer, with creative mode, multiplayer versus, first competitive of the kind, with speedrun and international leaderboard. Jump and dash your way, between walls and obstacles, to reach the teleport portal.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Spanish - Latin America*, Japanese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
